Uses of Interface
com.amazon.carbonado.repo.dirmi.RemoteRepository

    • Uses of RemoteRepository in com.amazon.carbonado.repo.dirmi

      Classes in com.amazon.carbonado.repo.dirmi that implement RemoteRepository 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RemoteRepositoryServer
      Wraps a repository for server-side access, which can be accessed on the client by ClientRepository.
      Methods in com.amazon.carbonado.repo.dirmi that return RemoteRepository 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RemoteRepository RemoteRepositoryServer.from(com.amazon.carbonado.Repository repo)
      Returns a remotely servable repository.
      Methods in com.amazon.carbonado.repo.dirmi with parameters of type RemoteRepository 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ClientRepository ClientRepository.from(RemoteRepository remote)
      Returns client access to a remote repository server.
      static ClientRepository ClientRepository.from(java.lang.String name, RemoteRepository remote)
      Returns client access to a remote repository server.
      static ClientRepository ClientRepository.from(java.lang.String name, RemoteRepository remote, com.amazon.carbonado.txn.TransactionMonitor monitor)
      Returns client access to a remote repository server.
      void ClientRepository.reconnect(RemoteRepository remote)
      Reconnects the repository in case of a disconnect.
